Author: commiepunk
Text: If you ask for help I don’t think you’ll be turned away. Worst case they might recommend IOP, where you go to treatment for a couple hours to a full day but go home when it’s over. If for some nightmare reason you are turned away, please don’t give up on recovery. I’ve been rejected from treatment before and it’s very discouraging, but there are people and facilities out there who will want to help.
